Case 1:08-cr-00330-BBD Filed 02/25/17 Page 12 of 15
By signing this Addendum, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the clarifications to the Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them.
R. ALEXANDER ACOSTA
UNITED STATES ATTORNEY
Dated: 10/30/07
By: Jeffrey T. Aloman FAUSA
A. MARIE VILLAPAÑA
ASSISTANT U.S. ATTORNEY
Dated: 10/29/07
JEFFREY EPSTEIN
Dated: ____________________
GERALD LEFCOURT, ESQ.
COUNSEL TO JEFFREY EPSTEIN
Dated: ____________________
LILLY ANN SANCHEZ, ESQ.
ATTORNEY FOR JEFFREY EPSTEIN
DOJ-OGR-00006503

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned copy of a signed addendum to a non-prosecution agreement. The document contains handwritten signatures and dates. The quality of the scan is clear, but there are some minor annotations and stamps present.
